o yahweh how great are your works and
your thoughts are very deep a brutish
man knows not and

it is that they shall be destroyed
forever
but thou yahweh art most high for

and I also shall see my desire on mine

like the palm tree he shall grow like a
cedar and Lebanon and those that be
planted in the house of Yahweh shall

they shall be fat and flourishing to
show that Yahweh he is upright he is my
